extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed OpenSSL and LibreSSL Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the installed versions of OpenSSL and LibreSSL to assess if they are affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed version of OpenSSL or LibreSSL affected?
Which version of OpenSSL or LibreSSL is installed?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade OpenSSL 1.0.2
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade OpenSSL 1.0.2 to version 1.0.2zd for premium support customers.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade OpenSSL 1.1.1
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade OpenSSL 1.1.1 to version 1.1.1n to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade OpenSSL 3.0
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade OpenSSL 3.0 to version 3.0.2 to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade OpenSSL 1.1.0
extracted_playbook.description: OpenSSL 1.1.0 is out of support. Upgrade to OpenSSL 3.0 or 1.1.1.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade LibreSSL
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade LibreSSL to the patched versions 3.3.6, 3.4.3, or 3.5.1 to mitigate the vulnerability.
